resources.string: The \'Cor-Aid\' app allows the NGO to know your location. Stay where you are or within your designated area. Stay away from other people and the NGO will provide you with its services. You will be informed when they will arrive to help.
Instructions you must follow to ensure safety of your family and yourself:-
1. Adopt practical measures to stay safe.
3. Cover your mouth and nose with your bent elbow or tissue when you cough or sneeze. Then dispose of the used tissue immediately.
4. Maintain at least 1 metre (3 feet) distance between yourself and anyone who is coughing or sneezing.
6. If you have a fever, cough and difficulty breathing, seek medical care early.
